Introduction

Fin.K.L was a four-member girl group formed by DSP Media (then known as Daesung Planning). They debuted in May 1998 with the album Fine Killing Liberty : Blue Rain. The group went on hiatus in 2002 to focus on their solo activities, making a comeback in 2005 and reuniting in 2019.

Their name stands for "Fine Killing Liberty".
